doc.field: New England Society in the City of Brooklyn records
New England Society in the City of Brooklyn records

This series is contained in Boxes 4 through 7 and contains materials recording financial transactions, expenditures, accounts, member payments, and other matters throughout the period 1880 to 1981. Items include statements and financial reports; check books; receipts and bills; a cash book; account books; voucher books; bank and financial statements; bills; stock confirmations; deposit tickets, receipts, and forms; checks; and securities bought and sold.
New England Society in the City of Brooklyn records
